components.content: Study period {{ data.offeringStatusToDisplay }}

components.label: HTML
components.content: Students will see the program name, description, and credential type including your study period name, dates, and year of program.

trigger.javascript:
/**
 * The given logic is added to the panel of the form to display the
 * form as read-only for ministry(AEST) user and also allow the hidden component values
 * to be calculated.
 * If a form.io is loaded with readOnly attribute set to true, then the restricts
 * hidden components to calculate it's value by design.
*/
result = (data.clientType !== 'institution');

components.label: Name
components.placeholder: Name (e.g. 2022 Fall semester, Term 1, Cohort A)

components.label: HTML
components.content:
Here’s an example of what students will see.
e.g. 2022 Winter co-op (Jan 15 2022 - Mar 20 2022) - Year 1

components.label: Program Offering Intensity Mismatch
Study period intensity popup
components.content:
The study period intensity is dependent on the program intensity
Your program must have the correct program intensity to be able to select the offering intensity here.

components.label: What is the course load for this offering?
invalidCourseLoad
components.calculateValue: value = data.courseLoad < 20 || data.courseLoad > 59;

components.label: How will this offering be delivered?
Program Offering Delivery Mismatch
components.calculateValue:
const mismatchValue =
  !((
    data.programDeliveryTypes.deliveredOnSite &&
    !data.programDeliveryTypes.deliveredOnline &&
    data.offeringDelivered === "onsite"
  ) ||
  (!data.programDeliveryTypes.deliveredOnSite &&
    data.programDeliveryTypes.deliveredOnline &&
    data.offeringDelivered === "online") ||
  (data.programDeliveryTypes.deliveredOnSite &&
    data.programDeliveryTypes.deliveredOnline &&
    (data.offeringDelivered === "online" ||
      data.offeringDelivered === "onsite" ||
      data.offeringDelivered === "blended")));

value = !!(data.offeringDelivered && mismatchValue);

components.label: HTML
components.content:
The study period delivery is dependent on the program delivery
Your program must have the correct delivery method(s) to be able to select the offering delivery here.

components.label: Does this contain a work-integrated learning component?
Program Offering WIL Mismatch
HTML
components.content:
This study period can’t contain a work-integrated component
Your program must be approved with a work-integrated component first.

components.label: What work-integrated learning type is contained within this study period?

validate.custom: valid=(data.studyStartDate) ? (data.studyStartDate<data.studyEndDate) ? true : 'End Date must be after Study Start Date' : 'Please provide Study Start date';

components.label: ineligibleDaysForFundingAfter10PercentageCalculation
allowable10Percentage
Invalid Study Dates
Invalid study dates popup
components.content:
This study period is ineligible for StudentAid BC funding
Your dates must be between 42 to 365 days.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
Identify scheduled breaks for the program year (August 1 to July 31).
  • Breaks should not exceed two weeks except calendar year-end break can be up to three weeks long (December to January)
  • Do not include break dates that are before or after the study period
  • Study breaks cannot exceed the 21 consecutive day. Excess break days will be deducted from total funded study period weeks
  • Study breaks cannot exceed the 10% threshold. Excess break days will be deducted from total funded study period weeks

components.label: Total break days

validate.customMessage: Breaks must be a minimum of 6 days.

components.label: Total eligible break days
Total ineligible break days
components.calculateValue:
// Breaks days (each) over 21 consecutive days must be unfunded.
value = row.breakDays - row.eligibleBreakDays;

components.label: Total days
Total funded weeks
Funded study period days
Unfunded study period days
sumOfTotalEligibleBreakDays
sumOfTotalInEligibleBreakDays
Invalid Study Breaks
Study Breaks Overlapping Detection
HTML
components.content:
This study break exceeds the 21 consecutive day threshold as outlined in StudentAid BC policy
Excess break will be deducted from total funded study period weeks.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
The combined study breaks exceed the 10% threshold as outlined in StudentAid BC policy
Excess break will be deducted from total funded study period weeks.

components.label: HTML
components.content: Please add the costs for each section (use 0 if there are no costs)

components.label: Do you want to add this study period for all students to select?

values.label: Yes, this offering is for all students
No, this offering is for a specific student

components.label: HTML
components.content: All information is subject to verification and auditing.

components.label: I confirm this study period offering meets the policies outlined in the StudentAid BC policy manual.
clientType
components.calculateValue:
//This value is assigned by Vue component. The scope of this value is only at client level.
value = data.clientType;

components.label: Offering Status
components.calculateValue:
value =
  data.programOfferingIntensityMismatch ||
  data.programOfferingDeliveryMismatch ||
  data.programOfferingWILMismatch ||
  data.invalidStudyDates ||
  data.invalidStudyBreaks ||
  data.invalidCourseLoad
    ? "Pending"
    : "Approved";

components.label: offeringStatusToDisplay
components.calculateValue:
//This property is assigned by the Vue component to display the Persisted offering status.
value = data.offeringStatusToDisplay;
